product_name: Royal Robbins Desert Knit Crew Shirt - Men's
long_description: Are you ready for your next big adventure? The answer is no if you haven't packed the travel-savvy Royal Robbins Desert Knit Crew shirt. Tencel(R)/polyester blend will keep you comfortable on your travel adventures; it resists wrinkles and dries quickly to keep you looking and feeling good. Fabric has a sand-washed finished for a soft hand. Shoulder seams are rotated forward so they won't rub when you're wearing a backpack. Straight hem with side splits looks great left untucked. The Royal Robbins Desert Knit Crew shirt has a traditional fit.
short_description: Are you ready for your next big adventure? The answer is no if you haven't packed the travel-savvy Royal Robbins Desert Knit Crew shirt.
